description: Updated JULIE_2_PLAN.md to reflect Phase 1 completion. Marked all immutable memory system deliverables as complete (checkpoint/recall tools, .memories/ architecture, SQL views, git integration, 26/26 tests passing). Documented critical Windows GLOB bug fix. Updated all storage path references from .julie/memories/ to .memories/ throughout document. Added project status section showing Phase 1 complete, Phase 1.5-3 not started.
